attributes.action: ban scotland the brave bieng played on st georges day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i was in the st georges day parade in my home town and i was astonished that amongst other non-elglish songs the band was playing scotland the brave. now, i have nothing against the scottish but i do think that st georges day should be a celebration of england and not other countries. this is why i want the playing of this song to be banned on st georges day.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
